statements: SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE season_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM crop_yield_data;
SELECT crop_name, SUM(yield_amount) AS total_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY yield_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE season_id = 1 ORDER BY yield_date DESC
SELECT crop_name, SUM(yield_amount) AS total_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY crop_name HAVING total_yield > 1000
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 500 ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT season_id, AVG(yield_amount) AS average_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY season_id HAVING average_yield < 500
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM seasons;
SELECT season_name FROM seasons;
SELECT season_name, season_id FROM seasons WHERE season_id < 5;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 1000;
SELECT season_name, crop_name FROM seasons s INNER JOIN crop_yield_data c ON s.season_id = c.season_id;
SELECT * FROM seasons ORDER BY season_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 1000;
SELECT season_name, crop_name, yield_amount FROM seasons INNER JOIN crop_yield_data ON seasons.season_id = crop_yield_data.season_id WHERE season_name = 'Spring';
SELECT season_name, AVG(yield_amount) AS average_yield FROM seasons INNER JOIN crop_yield_data ON seasons.season_id = crop_yield_data.season_id GROUP BY season_name;
SELECT season_name, crop_name, yield_amount FROM seasons LEFT JOIN crop_yield_data ON seasons.season_id = crop_yield_data.season_id WHERE yield_amount IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amt FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT season_name FROM seasons ORDER BY season_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM yield_data WHERE season_id = 2 AND yield_amt > 1000;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amt, date_recorded FROM crops JOIN yield_data ON crops.crop_id = yield_data.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amt FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, season_name, start_date, end_date FROM crops JOIN yield_data ON crops.crop_id = yield_data.crop_id JOIN seasons ON yield_data.season_id = seasons.season_id;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amt FROM crops WHERE yield_amt > 1000 ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT season_name, SUM(yield_amt) AS total_yield FROM seasons JOIN yield_data ON seasons.season_id = yield_data.season_id GROUP BY season_name ORDER BY total_yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM seasons;
SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM seasons WHERE season_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date FROM crops WHERE crop_type = 'fruit';
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT season_name, SUM(yield_amount) AS total_yield FROM seasons JOIN yields ON seasons.season_id = yields.season_id GROUP BY season_name;
SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM seasons WHERE season_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, harvest_date FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT season_name, yield_amount FROM seasons s JOIN yields y ON s.season_id = y.season_id WHERE y.yield_amount > 1000;
SELECT farmer_name, location, crop_name FROM farmers f JOIN crops c ON f.farmer_id = c.crop_id ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM seasons WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM fields WHERE field_area > 50;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, planting_season_id FROM crops WHERE planting_season_id = 2;
SELECT field_name, field_area FROM fields ORDER BY field_area ASC;
SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM seasons WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, planting_season_id FROM crops WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT field_name, field_area FROM fields WHERE field_area > 100 ORDER BY field_area ASC;
SELECT crop_id, yield_quantity, yield_date FROM yields WHERE yield_quantity > 100 ORDER BY yield_quantity DESC;
SELECT crop_id, field_id, planting_date FROM crop_fields WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
